programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Teenager Mac Denniston nearly lost his life in a mountain bike accident. The crash left him with a Traumatic Brain Injury, but 18 months on he's making remarkable progress.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Dr Huhana Hickey is a key figure in the disability community. She's organising a hikoi to seek a better future for the next generation - and marking her life story with a moko kauae.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Kelly & Ramya
programme.desc:
Kelly MacDonald, Ramya Amuthan and a team of blind and partially sighted contributors share arts, entertainment and lifestyle stories.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S07EP07) A summer heat wave finds much of Toronto taking refuge at the beach, but when a body marked by a large bite washes ashore rumours of a sea monster quickly spread across the city.
Année : 2008
Avec : Yannick Bisson (Detective William Murdoch) Hélène Joy (Dr. Julia Ogden) Thomas Craig (Inspector Brackenreid) Jonny Harris (Constable Crabtree) Georgina Reilly (Dr. Emily Grace)

programme.title: Double Tap TV
programme.desc:
(S05EP33) We speak with Be My Eyes, who are using ChatGPT AI to enhance their service, and a representative from Microsoft about their Bing AI technology.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Mind Your Own Business
programme.desc:
(S01EP08) Taylor became a parapalegic after an injury training as a gymnast. She has built up an online tea brand with impressive results. With the opening of her first café imminent, she has questions for the mentors.
Année : 2008

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
(S01EP12) Coal Valley is finally going to get some justice for the mine explosion when Circuit Judge Jedidiah Black comes to town. Jack confronts Elizabeth about her teaching offer. Jack and Elizabeth's relationship changes in a big way.
Année : 2014
Réalisation : Neill Fearnley
Scénario : Neal Dobrofsky
Avec : Lori Loughlin (Abigail Stanton) Daniel Lissing (Jack Thornton) Erin Krakow (Elizabeth Thatcher) Chelah Horsdal (Cat Montgomery) Mitchell Kummen (Gabe Montgomery) Martin Cummins (Henry Gowen) Chad Willett (Adam Miller) Jack Wagner (Bill Avery) James Brolin (Judge Jedidiah Black) Loretta Walsh (Florence Blakeley) Pascale Hutton (Rosemary LeVeaux)

programme.title: By Hook or By Cook
programme.desc:
(S01EP07) Carly, a former national para-skier, has never let vision loss hold her back from being healthy and active. Bruce is going to take Carly kayaking, but before they head for rough waters, they'll test their stability and fatigue.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Les quatre sens
programme.desc:
(S03EP04) We're getting all buttered up as Chatelaine food editor Claire Tansey joins Christine and Carl in the kitchen.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
Founded by Harold and Audrey Zettl, Harvest Community Inc. provides unique employment opportunities for individuals with a disability in Saskatchewan.

programme.title: Eyesoforst-l Job
programme.desc:

programme.title: Level Playing Field
programme.desc:
Hit the mat in Montreal with Canadian Para Judo star Priscilla Gagné. Then, Greg Westlake visits Holland Bloorview Kids Rehabilitation Hospital in Toronto to witness how they use sport as a tool in recovery.
Année : 2008

programme.title: #IGotThis
programme.desc:

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
